a nation of immigrants stands united.
In Trump's America, how great are you?

paragraphs.text: The following day, favorably comparing Russian dictator Joseph Stalin to Vladimir Putin, he gracelessly called the ruthless strongman’s Siberian gulags, where tens of thousands died in incredibly harsh conditions, “secluded spa resorts.”

paragraphs.name: beea
paragraphs.text: Just when you thought that White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer was starting to hit his stride, he rammed his foot back in his mouth with a series of offensive remarks that caused a national uproar and drew renewed outcries for his dismissal.

paragraphs.name: e12b
paragraphs.text: Yesterday saw another one-two punch of stunning verbal blunders when Spicer referred to Kim Jong Un’s hard labor camps in North Korea — where prisoners smash rocks for up to 14 hours a day — interesting “archaeological digs,” and the former Shah of Iran’s notorious Evin Prison, a brutal hell on earth by all accounts, a “must-see vacation destination.”

paragraphs.name: 058a
paragraphs.text: Called out by the White House press corps for his jaw-dropping series of embarrassing bloopers, Spicer said, “I screwed up, plain and simple — especially with it being Passover week, with our Secretary of State visiting Moscow, with a U.S. nuclear sub sitting provocatively off the coast of the Korean Peninsula, and President Trump determined to put Iran back in its place. As press secretary, I just have to learn to keep my mouth shut whenever the mainstream media asks me a question.”

e0823a9f4996.title: When watching him speak about Hitler, all I could think about was how I might respond to him if he…

paragraphs.text: When watching him speak about Hitler, all I could think about was how I might respond to him if he was a student in my tenth grade world history classroom. He is the definition of sophomoric! Thanks for the historical laugh.

9d23e36f75cf.title: This entire nightmare presidency is staffed from top to bottom with people who open their mouths…

paragraphs.text: This entire nightmare presidency is staffed from top to bottom with people who open their mouths only to change feet. The White House press guy Sean Spicer is the crowning turd in that swimming pool, but I don’t think anyone can claim to be surprised AND keep a straight face.
paragraphs.name: d339

7d5b08ecf3fb.title: The man surely has better knowledge of the Holocaust.

paragraphs.text: The man surely has better knowledge of the Holocaust. We are watching a man Crack under the strain of trying to make the bizarre presidency of Trump seem normal.

10e62f872f92.title: Allan was watching this when it happened; I knew you were going to have a field day with it.

paragraphs.text: Allan was watching this when it happened; I knew you were going to have a field day with it. He can’t get Assad’s name right, and the guy’s a mess. He needs a week at Camp David, since it’s not in use, which is like a spa.
paragraphs.name: 5be3

b6989b6cb658.title: Unlike unlikeable Kellyanne, who is fluent in double-talk, circular arguments, pivot strategies…

paragraphs.text: Unlike unlikeable Kellyanne, who is fluent in double-talk, circular arguments, pivot strategies, and without taking a breath, can deliver a long series of run-on sentences that has caused many an interviewer to reach for their 2nd Amendment toolset, Sean (who failed English, History, and Ethics courses) is misinformed, misguided, and only wishes he could be misquoted when trying to justify missiles.
paragraphs.name: c8b2

285b75a03a0f.name: Allan Wing

c93dbd2ed33e.name: Harper Thorpe
